body:
Welcome to my Ask me ALMOST anything. 

I wont answer questions that get to, wierd :D



What made me want to make an AMAA: So you guys can know me better :3

How am i today: Great because its Ma B'Day!!!!

Why u gotta be so Darude Mooch? Quit hating on AMA's :)
